column1: Little Goat Diner////I ordered the Patty Melt and what was their "Dr. Pepper"
column2: called a pepper elixir (it tasted like Dr. Pepper with a cough syrup aftertaste). I was a little disturbed that everything was served "a la carte"
column4: meant I only got a patty melt for $13 dollars and that didn't include a side of any kind. Had to order that separate.
